name: Principal Component Analysis (PCA)
description: A generalized PCA with privacy preserving that performs dimensionality reduction without sharing raw data

functions.name: central
functions.description: Central part of a federated PCA algorithm.

arguments.name: features
arguments.description: List of column names to include in PCA. If None, numeric columns are used.

arguments.name: n_components
arguments.description: Number of principal components to return. If None, all components are returned.

arguments.name: center
arguments.description: If True, compute covariance using global centering.

functions.name: partial
functions.description: Computes local sufficient statistics, such as n, sum of features and sum of outer products (X^T X)

arguments.name: features
arguments.description: List of column names to include in PCA. If None, numeric columns are used.
